Wisdom: رُبَّ فَقِيرٍ أَغْنَى مِنْ كُلِّ غَنِيٍّ
enWisdom: Many a poor person is wealthier than all the rich people
Many a poverty turns into with lasting affluence
How many a poor person is needed by someone else

Wisdom: كَمْ مِنْ مَنْقُوصٍ رَابِحٍ وَمَزْيَدٍ خَاسِرٍ
enWisdom: How often it is that one who gets less, benefits while one who gets more, loses

Wisdom: كَمْ مِنْ فَقِيرٍ غَنِيٌّ وَغَنِيٍّ مُفْتَقِرٌ
enWisdom: How many a poor person is rich and [how many] a rich person is needy
Dispense with your dependency on anyone and you will be like him
